parameters.name: BusinessType
parameters.description:
The type of the collected logs. Default value: cdn_log_access_l1. Valid values:

*   **cdn_log_access_l1**: access logs of Dynamic Content Delivery Network (DCDN) points of presence (POPs)
*   **cdn_log_origin**: back-to-origin logs
*   **cdn_log_er**: EdgeRoutine logs

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description:
The data center. Valid values:

*   cn: China
*   sg: Singapore
*   in: India
*   eu: Europe
*   us: United States

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain names from which logs were collected. You can specify one or more domain names. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of a real-time log delivery project.

parameters.name: SLSLogStore
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service Logstore.

parameters.name: SLSProject
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project.

parameters.name: SLSRegion
parameters.description: The region to which real-time logs are delivered.
